alert.note: Alert for Big Hole Mountains; Blackfoot Mountains; Caribou Range (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 10 at 2:36PM MDT by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...Thunderstorms capable of producing brief gusty winds will impact portions of northeastern Caribou, southeastern Bonneville and east central Bingham Counties through 330 PM MDT... At 234 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking thunderstorms along a line extending from near Palisades Reservoir to near Blackfoot Reservoir. Movement was southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 35 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Blackfoot Reservoir, Palisades Reservoir, Wayan, Henry, Mill Canyon Campground, Freedom, and Grays Lake. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...35 MPH
info.instruction: If on or near Blackfoot or Palisades Reservoirs, get out of the water and move indoors or inside a vehicle. Strong winds will create rough chop. Lightning can strike out to 10 miles from the parent thunderstorm. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Move to safe shelter now! Do not be caught on the water in a thunderstorm.

area.areaDesc: Big Hole Mountains; Blackfoot Mountains; Caribou Range
